definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: measurement, proportion;—abs. Ez Eze 43:10 (< read [[תָּכְּנִיתוֹ]] LXX Ew Hi Co Toy al.); ´[[חוֹתֵם ת]]: Eze 28:12 thou wert one sealing up (the) measure (RVm), i.e. exhibiting perfect proportion; Codd Sm al. ´[[חוֹחַם ת]]: the seal of  (perfect) proportion; but dub., v. Comm.
